title: I Hope They Call Me on a Mission
short_title: I Hope They Call Me on a Mission
content: I Hope They Call Me on a Mission
Be better prepared for tomorrow by learning these skills today.

If you practice simple cooking now, one day you will be a kitchen pro! And thatâ€™s great, because home-cooked meals are yummy, less expensive, and usually healthier. They also encourage families to spend time together.
Before you begin cooking, ask yourself:
Do I have an adult to help me?
Do I have the time, ingredients, and tools needed for this recipe?
